meanings.definition: Plenaries: meetings or sessions where all members are present
meanings.sent1: During the plenaries, everyone in the group shared their ideas.

meanings.sent3: At the plenaries, even the quietest members had a chance to speak up.

meanings.sent5: The plenaries were the heart of the decision-making process.

meanings.definition: Plenaries: complete or full in every respect
meanings.sent1: The team ensured their project was plenaries before presenting it.
